sellerUserStories.description: As a Seller, I want to register an account so that I can log in and manage my products.
As a Seller, I want to add new products with categories and subcategories so that customers can find them.
As a Seller, I want to update my product details so that the information is accurate.
As a Seller, I want to delete my products so that they are no longer available for customers.
As a Seller, I want to update my profile information so that it is current.
As a Seller, I want to delete my profile if I no longer wish to use the platform.
As a Seller, I want to see new orders in the dashboard, update their status to active or shipped, and mark them as delivered when the customer receives the product.
As a Seller, I want to view the history of all orders and the customers who purchased from me.
As a Seller, I want to manage my inventory levels, set low-stock alerts, and automatically update product availability.
As a Seller, I want to receive payment for delivered orders.

customerUserStories.description: As a Customer, I want to see all product categories so that I can choose which one to shop from.
As a Customer, I want to filter products by subcategory, price, and size (for clothes) so that I can find what I need.
As a Customer, I want to view detailed information and images of a product so that I can decide whether to buy it.
As a Customer, I want to add products to my cart so that I can purchase them all at once.
As a Customer, I want to purchase all items in my cart and choose a payment method (Visa or cash on delivery).
As a Customer, I want to see my active orders, confirm receipt of items, and view order history.
As a Customer, I want to update my profile information so that it is current.
As a Customer, I want to view the profiles of sellers and their products.
As a Customer, I want to add reviews and ratings for products I have purchased.
As a Customer, I want to filter products based on reviews and ratings.
As a Customer, I want to create wishlists of products I am interested in but not ready to purchase.
